comment: Lemma for ~ numclwwlk7 , ~ frgrreggt1 and ~ frgrreg : If a finite, nonempty friendship graph is ` K `-regular, the ` K ` is a nonnegative integer. (Contributed by AV, 3-Jun-2021.)
